Name: The Trud
About the game: The Trud is a first person game that seeks an atmospheric and immersive horror, the game combines exploration with stealth , you'll need to find out what's happening and find a way out of your torment while being hunted. After passing out while running from a maniac on the street, the character wakes up in a very strange place, that surprisingly looks very familiar. It's almost like it wasn't real. During the game you'll need to understand what's happening in that place and find a way out while The Trud tries to stop you, appealing to your worst nightmares. The Trud is developed by a one-man army, that means that your suggestion will be taken very seriously c: Don't be afraid to give it.
Meta Title: The Trud: May 22, 2020, Matheus Antonio and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on The Trud? Check out the release date (May 22, 2020), developer insights from Matheus Antonio, and a complete game summary.
